titleStmt.title: The parable of the ten virgins opened & applied being the substance of divers sermons on Matth. 25, I-13 wherein the difference between the sincere Christian and the ... hypocrite ... are clearly discovered ... / by Thomas Shephard ; now published from the authours own notes ... by Jonathan Mitchell ... Tho. Shephard, son to the reverend author ...
titleStmt.author: Shepard, Thomas, 1605-1649.
Mitchel, Jonathan, 1624-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Hayes for John Rothwell,

notesStmt.note: "The second part of the parable" has separate paging.
"The epistle to the reader" signed: Jonathan Mitchel.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
